Class.name: Sample.RemoteProxy
Class.Description: sample of a remote proxy using %Net.RemoteConnection

Method.name: %CreateInstance
Method.Description: open instance of a different class using given %ID

Method.name: Debug
Method.Implementation: set w = ..%New() do w.%Connect({"Namespace":"SAMPLES", "Username":"_SYSTEM", "Password":"SYS"}) //do w."Sample.Person::PrintPersons"(1) w w."Cinema.Duration::LogicalToDisplay"(200)

Method.name: %Connect
Method.Description: pass the configuration object { "IP": IP, "Namespace" : Namespace, ... }

Method.name: ApparentlyClassName
%DispatchMethod
Method.Description: log arguments and then dispatch dynamically method to the proxy object

Method.name: InvokeClassMethod
Method.Implementation: #dim returnValue = "" #dim i as %Integer do ..RemoteConnection.ResetArguments() for i=1:1:$get(args) { set ..LastStatus = ..RemoteConnection.AddArgument(args(i), 0) } set ..LastStatus = ..RemoteConnection.InvokeClassMethod(ClassName, MethodName, .returnValue, $quit) return returnValue
